00027 /* i18n support macros. */
00028 
00029 /* the following macros are used for gettext support. */
00030 
00037 #define _(String) (char *) gettext(String)
00038 
00045 #define gettext_noop(String) (String)
00046 
00053 #define N_(String) gettext_noop(String)
